work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: Worked with Microsoft Dynamics CRM to build, optimize and manage company data to maximize profits.

work.title: Private Tutor
work.description: Taught HTML, CSS and Python to 3 students in age group of 14-17.

projects.name: React-Native-Build-Charts
projects.description: Built a react native npm module that takes in data and returns a chart that plots that data. The different types of charts that can be plotted are a bar chart, pie chart and line chart. Built module using react-native-svg. Has reached over 500 weekly downloads.

projects.name: React-Native-Image-Filter-Android
projects.description: Built a react native npm module that takes in an image and returns a filtered image. Built native modules using java, for performing different types of operations like grayscale, saturation, compression, rotation, cropping, colour filtering and contrast enhancement. Has reached over 1300 weekly downloads.

projects.name: React-Native-Slice-Image
projects.description: Built a react native npm module that takes in an image and cuts a part of that image by using panning. Built the panning functionality using the React Native Animated Library, and the cropping functionality with the React-Native-Image-Editor Library. Has reached over 400 weekly downloads.

projects.name: React-Native-Send-Receive-SMS-Android
projects.tags: React-Native, Javascript, Java, SMS Api, Android Studio
projects.description: Built a react native npm module that sends and receives SMS using the SMS manager in Android. Has touched 286 weekly downloads.
